title: Son Says 'Parental Insanity' Drove Father to Scam
itunes:title: Son Says 'Parental Insanity' Drove Father to Scam
description:
Patricia Hurtado, Bloomberg Legal Reporter, discusses the sentencing of a father in the college admissions scandal and the upcoming trial of 8 parents.

Holly Barker, Bloomberg Law Senior Legal Reporter, discusses how dementia takes a toll on aging lawyers.

June Grasso hosts.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
